creator: david_laurencin@yahoo.fr
text:
I obtain part of xml duplication in pdf renderer when I use 0.20.5 instead of 
older version (0.20.3 & 0.20.4)
I use xsl:fo & parse an xml which encapsulate several level of paragraphs.
It is not a xerces/xalan version problem (same error with xercesImpl-
2.2.1.jar/xercesImpl-2.0.1.jar & xalan-2.4.1.jar/xalan-2.3.1.jar).

Do you need a copy of xml source & xsl stylesheet ?

creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
text:
1. Read http://xml.apache.org/fop/gethelp.html
2. Describe symptoms rather than guess wildly about the cause.
Well, as we already are at wild guesses, I think you got #17472. Read the other
duplicates carefully.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 17472 ***
batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
creator: gadams@apache.org
